content: I think conflicts in the group chat are pretty rare, but when they do come up, we usually just laugh it off and move on. We're all pretty laid-back and don't want to let disagreements ruin the vibe of the chat. As for topics, I think we mostly stick to lighthearted stuff, but sometimes we'll discuss current events or pop culture news. We've had some interesting discussions about new movies or TV shows, for example.
